page.title: 18HOME LIFE 2
page.content:
The bell rings again at 1.30 and we do more work until 3.30 when school ends. When we get hame we usually play in our gang huts or watch television until supper. In the warmer weather we play out again after supper, but in the winter we stay near the fire and watch T.V. or read or play games.
We are three children in a group from Newhall Primary School. We all live in different clusters of houses which were originally built for special workers e.g. foresters. We all get up about 8.00am. to catch the mini bus which will take us to school. When we get to school we will have a short time to play before the bell rings to start school. There are eleven people in primary 6 including us.
